title: Great Deal! River North 1-Bedroom. Restaurants, Pool, Gym!
posting_body: For quickest response call or text Mandy @ 773-414-4222
When is your move date?(is it flexible, if so how far in either direction)?
Have you toured any properties yet?(so that I don't double up on my research)
When are you available for a showing?
This property is located right in the heart of the action of River North.
By that we mean it’s an easy walk to the Red, Purple and Brown Line CTA trains as well as Michigan Ave, and frankly, just too many great restaurant options to name.
The building has undergone an extensive renovation in recent years, making it now more than ever “the place to be.”
There is a ton of amenity space here: an expansive lobby with billiards, a conference room and business center, a gym and a large indoor/outdoor pool to name a few.
The pool opens up to a spacious rooftop terrace with grilling/bar areas, a firepit and plenty of seating.
The views up there are phenomenal!
There is 24-hour door staff and the building is 100% smoke-free.
The apartments here are spacious with generous closets, and many layouts have a balcony.
Wood finish flooring comes standard in the living spaces (there is carpet in bedrooms).
Kitchens feature modern espresso cabinetry, granite countertops with a tile backsplash and newer black appliances including dishwasher and microwave.
All two bedrooms homes have an in-unit washer and dryer and there is a large laundry room on-site to serve the rest of the building.
Parking is available on-site at an additional charge.
Cats and dogs are accepted throughout (dog breed and weight restrictions apply).
Disclaimer: Photos may not be of exact unit available and may be of various model units and various vacant units.
Apartment availability and lease terms may vary.
Pricing, availability, and specials are subject to change at any time and without notice.
Please note that the price may be net effective of a special or concession that the building is currently running.
Information is believed to be accurate, however, is subject to errors and omissions.

HotSpot Rentals services the following neighborhoods: South Loop, Printers Row, Near North, River North, Gold Coast, West Loop, Fulton River District, West Loop Gate, The Loop, Streeterville, Lakeshore East, New East Side, Old Town, Medical District, University Village, Near North, River West, Lincoln Park South, Lakeview, Uptown, Ukrainian Village, Wicker Park, Edgewater, Ravenswood, Bronzeville, Logan Square
